overview: A couple hosting another couple for a dinner feast in an upper middle class setup. The evening begins just like any other a simple get together. Tea, biscuits chit chat and some Bengali 'adda'. The dinner on the other hand turns out to be another affair. Trying to show off and pretend to appreciate the other couple we see what pans out in the course of their 3 course meal. The make believe world we create for ourselves and the price others pay for that.
title: The Dinner
